akn:content.akn:p: (a) In order to be entitled to payments for allotments under section 702 of this title for a fiscal year, a State must prepare and transmit to the Secretary an application (in a standardized form specified by the Secretary) that— The application shall be developed by, or in consultation with, the State maternal and child health agency and shall be made public within the State in such manner as to facilitate comment from any person (including any Federal or other public agency) during its development and after its transmittal.
(b) The Secretary may waive the requirements under subsection (a)(3) that a State’s application for a fiscal year provide for the use of funds for specific activities if for that fiscal year—
